duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in building and managing data and/or Big Data pipeline capabilities including data modeling, process design, and overall data pipeline architecture.
Assist in efforts to partially to completely automate repeatable data preparation and integration tasks.
Analyzing information to determine business needs and implementing effective technical solutions.
Taking a new perspective on existing solutions to solve problems of low to moderate complexity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and two years of experience in systems engineering or administration or equivalent education and related training or experience
